data.title: Spectroscopy of Planetary Nebulae in Sextans A and Sextans B
data.meta_description: Sextans A and Sextans B are two dIr galaxies situated in the outskirts of the Local Group (LG), in which both PNe and H II regions have been detected (Jacoby & Lesser [5], Magrini et al. [6], [7]). We present spectroscopic observations of PNe and HII regions in...
